snippet: If you ask running back Brandon Jacobs, this season's Giants team is quite different from the one that beat the Patriots in the Super Bowl four years ago.
abstract: If you ask running back Brandon Jacobs, this season's Giants team is quite different from the one that beat the Patriots in the Super Bowl four years ago.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS -- A common question being asked of players on the Giants and the New England Patriots this week is an obvious one: what are the similarities between this season's teams and the ones that played each other four years ago in Super Bowl XLII?

headline.main: Jacobs Says Confidence Is the Difference This Time Around
